channel.title: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Basics
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Discover what this Cap'n Hugo theme be all about an' th' core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Rambl'n
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Find out how t' create an' org'nize yer rrrambl'n quickly an' intuitively.

item.title: Shorrrtcodes
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some stuff may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, see'ng Merrrmaids, do'ng math or chemistrrry and stuff. Cap'n Hugo uses Marrrkdown fer its simple rrrambl'n format. However, there be a lot o' th'ns that Marrrkdown doesnâ€™t support well. Ye could use pure HTML t' expand possibilities. But this happens t' be a bad idea. Everyone uses Marrrkdown because it’s pure an' simple t' read even non-rendered.
